txt.en: Fang Point is a large Warg den, and the pack that lives there has been ravaging the road that runs through the centre of the Wold.
You have defeated a number of vicious Wargs at Fang Point, making the roads safer for all who travel in the Wold between Harwick and the Norcrofts.
Fang Point is a large Warg den, and the pack that lives there has been ravaging the road that runs through the centre of the Wold.
Wargs can be found in and around Fang Point in the Wold.\n\nYou should search Fang Point for the Wargs that prowl the roads, making travel dangerous for all who venture into the Wold.
You have defeated a number of vicious Wargs at Fang Point, making the roads safer for all who travel in the Wold between Harwick and the Norcrofts.
